components.name: EmailInputComponent

inputsClass.name: placeholder
inputsClass.rawdescription: A placeholder for the email input field. This will be disappeared when the email is typed.
inputsClass.description: A placeholder for the email input field. This will be disappeared when the email is typed.

outputsClass.name: emailChange
outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits the new email when the input changes or undefined if the email is invalid
outputsClass.description: Emits the new email when the input changes or undefined if the email is invalid

propertiesClass.name: control
propertiesClass.rawdescription: A control to validate the email.

propertiesClass.name: destroy$
propertiesClass.description: Observable emitting when the component is destroyed
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Observable emitting when the component is destroyed

components.rawdescription: Email input components for contact modal.

constructorObj.name: constructor
constructorObj.description: Connects the input control to component outputs
constructorObj.rawdescription: Connects the input control to component outputs

components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="email-text-field" appearance="outline">
  <mat-label> Email </mat-label>
  <input type="email" matInput [formControl]="control" [placeholder]="placeholder" />

  <mat-error *ngIf="control.hasError('email') && !control.hasError('required')">
    Please enter a valid email address
  </mat-error>
  <mat-error *ngIf="control.hasError('required')"> Email is required! </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.description: A reusable text field component that can be used to input text. This input field component also had required validation check.
components.rawdescription:
A reusable text field component that can be used to input text.
This input field component also had required validation check.

constructorObj.name: constructor
constructorObj.description: Creates an instance of required input component and it connect the form control value changes to check for validation before output emmiter is triggered
constructorObj.rawdescription:
Creates an instance of required input component
and it connect the form control value changes to check for validation
before output emmiter is triggered

components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="form-field" appearance="outline">
  <mat-label> {{ label }} </mat-label>
  <input matInput [formControl]="control" />
  <mat-error *ngIf="control.hasError('required')">{{ label }} is required!</mat-error>
</mat-form-field>

components.rawdescription: The required textbox component displays a message box for users to add a message

constructorObj.name: constructor
constructorObj.description: Connects the input control to component outputs
constructorObj.rawdescription: Connects the input control to component outputs

components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="message-field" appearance="outline">
  <mat-label> {{ label }} </mat-label>
  <textarea
    cdkTextareaAutosize
    cdkAutosizeMinRows="10"
    cdkAutosizeMaxRows="20"
    matInput
    [formControl]="control"
    [placeholder]="placeholder"
  ></textarea>
  <mat-error *ngIf="control.hasError('required')"> {{ label }} is required! </mat-error>
</mat-form-field>
